name: Umbrelli Fish (Game)
description:
Explore the city collecting components to construct a contraption to make it rain once more...or just play around. It's up to you!

If you are looking to complete the game there is no saving, but it should be pretty quick redoing things after you figure it out. 

All programming, assets, and music done by me, Guardian. 

No need to purchase, but if you would like to support my games, assets, and more your support is very much appreciated!

Feel free to give feedback.

Thank you for playing!
